Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to moving the division of cemeteries from the department of state to the department of health
Summary: Relates to moving the division of cemeteries from the department of state to the department of health.
LawCode: Amd §§1504, 1401, 1502, 1507, 1507-a & 1510, N-PC L; amd §365, Exec L; amd §97-r, St Fin L; amd §165, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, the executive law, the state finance law and the general municipal law, in relation to moving the division of cemeteries from the department of state to the department of health
